(4/4) The first of these office hours will be Thursday, November 21, 2019, from 1:30-3:30 PM at the Chamber of Commerce of Okeechobee County, 55 South Parrott Ave, Okeechobee, FL 34974. As always, you can contact my office at 202-225-5792 if you need immediate assistance.

(3/4) However, my commitment to the people of Okeechobee does not end with the closing of this office. I will continue to visit the area to meet with constituents and my staff will hold regular office hours to assist local constituents with any issues they may have.
(2/4) I had intended to keep this office open throughout my time in Congress to serve the people of Okeechobee and surrounding counties and I am disappointed that I will no longer be able to do so.
